sentences.en: Aleck glowed ; she was profoundly happy.
sentences.cn: 艾莱柯心潮澎湃,她高兴极了.

sentences.en: As he cuddles with her, it feels like he’s doing the same with me — that’s how profoundly I feel we are all intertwined.
sentences.cn: 当他搂住她的时候，感觉就像是他也在搂着我——这就是为什么我感到我们被深深地羁绊住了。

sentences.en: Business and economic life were profoundly disorganized.
sentences.cn: 商业和经济生活遭到严重干扰.

sentences.en: He profoundly believed in his future success.
How odd life was, how unfathomable, how profoundly unjust.
sentences.cn: 生活多么离奇，多么莫测，多么不公啊！

sentences.en: I am so profoundly interested in its miserable inhabitants.'
sentences.cn: 我对苦难的居民有深刻的关心, ”

sentences.en: In politics, as in other areas, he is profoundly conservative.
sentences.cn: 就像在其他领域一样，他在政治方面也非常保守。

sentences.en: It disturbs me profoundly that you so misuse your talents.
sentences.cn: 你如此滥用自己的才能,使我深感不安.

sentences.en: Many of these children are profoundly deaf.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子中有许多是全聋的.

sentences.en: Memory can be profoundly shaped by subsequent experience.
sentences.cn: 记忆会受到后来经历的深刻影响.
她现在已经严重失聪了。

sentences.en: Such offences as his profoundly endanger public security.
sentences.cn: 他这样的犯法行为极大地危及公共安全.

sentences.en: Susan nodded sagely as if what I had said was profoundly significant.
sentences.cn: 苏珊洞悉一切似的点点头，好像我所说的话意义深刻。

sentences.en: This film will make every Chinese rethink profoundly.
sentences.cn: 该片使每个中国人作深刻的反思.

sentences.en: This has profoundly affected my life.
sentences.cn: 这给我的生活带来了深刻的影响。

sentences.en: We are profoundly affected by what happens to us in childhood.
sentences.cn: 童年发生的事深深地影响着我们。

words.tran_cn: 深厚的；意义深远的；渊博的

trans.tran_cn: 深深地，深切地，深刻地，极度地
